name: Elder Nolan McNamara
descriptions: Elder Nolan McNamara is the head of the Mojave chapter of the Brotherhood of Steel living at the Hidden Valley bunker in 2281.

Elder McNamara was once a head paladin. This act earned him an enormous amount of respect and loyalty from his chapter. He assumed command of the Mojave chapter, and the rank of elder, when Father Elijah vanished during the battle. He is credited with saving the Mojave chapter from complete eradication.

Fearing that the NCR would continue to hunt down the Mojave chapter, McNamara put the Hidden Valley bunker on lockdown, not allowing anyone but small scouting parties to leave, nor allowing any Brotherhood members who were outside to enter.
McNamara was written by designer Jesse Farrell.

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Ah, outsider. I've heard that you were instrumental in providing Hardin with the evidence to bring against me. And here I had thought to use{lightly stressed}you.

topics.topic_text: I was just exploring the area and noticed your patrol coming out of here.
topics.response_text: You took an extreme risk in coming here. My policy towards trespassers has not been... lenient.

topics.topic_text: Why haven't you killed the ranger already?
topics.response_text: Yes, we could kill him easily enough. But sometimes you can learn a great deal by observing people, both enemies and friends.

topics.topic_text: The ranger won't be a problem. He's dead.
topics.response_text: How do you know he won't be missed, that other rangers won't come looking for him? Or NCR patrols? Did you just make matters worse?

topics.topic_text: He told me himself that no one knew where he was.
topics.response_text: Indeed he did. The collar includes a microphone, you see. Part of the test.

topics.topic_text: It was a calculated risk. Asking questions would have tipped him off.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] So you weighed the value of confirming if his location was known against your advantage of surprise. All right.

topics.topic_text: I'm not sure.
topics.response_text: That's right. Because you did nothing to find out. Your collar was rigged with a microphone, you see. Part of the test.

topics.topic_text: The ranger won't be a problem. He's gone.
topics.response_text: Gone? Why did he leave? And what makes you think he won't be back?

topics.topic_text: Not interested. I don't do murder-for-hire.
topics.response_text: I never said the ranger had to be killed. And I wasn't giving you the option. I merely asked if you understood.

topics.topic_text: I can take care of the Ranger.
topics.response_text: Very well. I'll be interested to see how thoroughly and efficiently you carry out your mission.

topics.topic_text: May I have permission to trade with your armory?
topics.response_text: Very well. It's to our benefit that you'd be well-equipped. I'll send word ahead.

topics.topic_text: McNamaraPowerArmorTraining
topics.response_text: ...There, I think you've got the knack of it now. You should now be able to wear any kind of power armor you come across.

topics.topic_text: I'll begin looking immediately.
topics.response_text: I'm glad I can count on you. Oh, and one other thing. The patrols each had a holotape detailing their missions that you can use to track them.

topics.topic_text: Yes, here are their holotapes.
topics.response_text: {Solemn}They were all dead, then. I suppose I'm not surprised. We have few friends in the world above, and many enemies.

topics.topic_text: No, I've only found one of them so far. Both paladins were dead.
topics.response_text: While that is disheartening news, there remains hope that the other two patrols may still be found alive.

topics.topic_text: I've found two of the patrols. All of the paladins were dead.
topics.response_text: T-That is unfortunate. As long as there is a chance to find the remaining patrol, however, I must still ask you to try.

topics.topic_text: No, I'm still working on it.
topics.response_text: Remain diligent, outsider. If those patrols are in trouble, every second you delay lessens their chances of rescue.

topics.topic_text: I did. Lorenzo's on it.
topics.response_text: {Relieved, sighs}Good news for a change. Your efforts have humbled me, outsider. You have done more than I could expect, even from my Brothers.

topics.topic_text: I'm still looking for them.
topics.response_text: Please make all haste in your search. It is imperative that I know the results of his mission.

topics.topic_text: Yes, I did. Here are their reports.
topics.response_text: Good, let's take a look... Hmmm, if I'm reading this right, it appears that the NCR's grip on this region is nowhere near as firm as I thought.

topics.topic_text: No, not yet.
topics.response_text: Well, return when you have.

topics.topic_text: I think I already found one of your patrols. Both Paladins were dead.
topics.response_text: While that is disheartening news, there remains hope that the other two patrols may still be found alive.

topics.topic_text: I already found a couple of your patrols. The paladins were all dead.
topics.response_text: T-That is unfortunate. As long as there is a chance to find the remaining patrol, however, I must still ask you to try.

topics.topic_text: I already found all three patrols. They were all dead.
topics.response_text: {Solemn}I suppose I am not surprised. We have few friends in the world above, and many enemies.

topics.topic_text: Not all of them.
topics.response_text: Keep looking for them. The information they have is vital.

topics.topic_text: I want to join the Brotherhood.
topics.response_text: You've certainly earned the right, but I'm afraid there's a slight matter of protocol that must be dealt with first.

topics.topic_text: Yes, what is the task?
topics.response_text: As one of our patrols discovered, the mutants just to the northeast have become strangely violent in the years we were secluded.

topics.topic_text: {McNamara linked lines}
topics.response_text: Then allow me to explain our situation. This bunker is currently locked down, allowing no entry or exit, with you being one of the few exceptions.

topics.topic_text: I have better things to do.
topics.response_text: Then that is your choice. If you should change your mind, please return.

topics.topic_text: Surely you have people better suited to look for them than me.
topics.response_text: The less who are aware of this situation, the better. My brothers and sisters were deeply traumatized by the losses we incurred several years ago.

topics.topic_text: I was hoping to speak to you about other matters.
topics.response_text: I can spare a little time. What did you want to talk about?

topics.topic_text: I found one of your patrols out in the waste. Your men are dead.
topics.response_text: That is sad news, indeed, and I thank you for making your way here to convey it to us, but now the issue remains that an outsider knows our location.

topics.topic_text: Actually, I'd rather just be going. If I could just have my belongings back...
topics.response_text: I'm afraid that's not a possibility at the moment. Let's just say that your eventual safe departure from here relies on how forthcoming you are.

topics.topic_text: No, what I told your man before was the truth. I don't like repeating myself.
topics.response_text: I applaud your commitment to your own word, though it saddens me to hear of the fate of our comrades.

topics.topic_text: It was a complete accident, I swear.
topics.response_text: Accident or no, we both now find ourselves in an uncomfortable situation.

topics.topic_text: I convinced him that staying here was more dangerous than moving on.
topics.response_text: Yes, you exploited his fear of Powder Gangers very effectively. The collar includes a microphone, you see. Part of the test.

topics.topic_text: He was going to leave if he couldn't get his radio working. So I destroyed it.
topics.response_text: I see. And he's not particularly likely to come back, since he's learned that the bunkers here aren't secure enough to serve as safehouses.

topics.topic_text: Just tell me what you want me to do.
topics.response_text: I would like you to find the components we need to fix this bunker's air filtration system. I cannot overstate the importance of this task.

topics.topic_text: Go on.
topics.response_text: The device that creates the sandstorms above, that masks our comings and goings, was only intended to be used in case of emergencies.

topics.topic_text: That depends on the task.
topics.response_text: Do not hesitate, my friend. Learn from my mistake and go boldly, one way or the other.

topics.topic_text: On second thought, I'm not really interested in joining the Brotherhood at the moment.
topics.response_text: Regrettable, but understandable. Should you change your mind, return here. I will hold off on assigning the task to my brethren, for now.

topics.topic_text: I installed the device up at Black Mountain, as instructed.
topics.response_text: Yes, we've already started receiving telemetry from it. This will be a great help in our future efforts, and I thank you.

topics.topic_text: I already know how to use power armor.
topics.response_text: Would you like to tell me where you learned such a thing?

topics.topic_text: Please do.
topics.response_text: First, let's go over how to put it on...

topics.topic_text: Don't I just put it on?
topics.response_text: If only it were that simple. Think of power armor as a machine to be operated rather than clothing you'd wear.

topics.topic_text: Tell me about the lockdown.
topics.response_text: It's a protective measure that was enacted after our defeat at HELIOS. The NCR was hot on our heels, and we wouldn't have survived another encounter.

topics.topic_text: How do you get supplies?
topics.response_text: We have some personnel that are allowed to travel on the surface. They trade for what we need, and occasionally drop off what they acquire.

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: All right. What did you wish to speak about?

topics.topic_text: What is with that crazy sandstorm on the surface?
topics.response_text: That is this base's defensive system. It serves as camouflage and masks all entry and exit from the bunker.

topics.topic_text: Tell me about what happened at HELIOS.
topics.response_text: We were overrun, plain and simple. My Brothers fought with great courage, but in the end the enemy was just too many.

topics.topic_text: Did you know Hardin is trying to find a way to become Elder?
topics.response_text: Oh yes, he's been trying for quite some time. Hardin has been strongly opposed to the lockdown from the first. It goes against his nature, you see.

topics.topic: VDialogueHiddenValleyNolanMcNamaraTopic046{Telling about the NCR wanting to destroy the BoS}
topics.topic_text: The NCR is currently looking to destroy you.
topics.response_text: Yes, I've always known they were. Luckily, they don't know exactly where we are. And even if they did, our position here is fortified.

topics.topic_text: VEndingBrotherhood
topics.response_text: {Narrating}Buried beneath tons of rubble, the Mojave chapter of the Brotherhood of Steel was no more.

conversation.response_text: I understand your concern, Edgar, but the answer is no.
Hello Veronica. How goes your mission?
High Elder Maxson didn't found us to be botanists, Veronica.
That could be the only one of its kind.
